SELECT * FROM SCRAP S FULL OUTER JOIN USERS U ON S.USER_NO = U.USER_NO FULL OUTER JOIN MEETING M ON S.SCRAP_REFERER_NO = M.MEETING_NO FULL OUTER JOIN PHOTO P ON M.MEETING_NO = P.PHOTO_REFERER_NO FULL OUTER JOIN LOCATION1 L1 ON M.LOCATION1_NO = L1.LOCATION1_NO FULL OUTER JOIN LOCATION2 L2 ON M.LOCATION2_NO = L2.LOCATION2_NO FULL OUTER JOIN EXERCISE E ON M.EXERCISE_NO = E.EXERCISE_NO WHERE S.USER_NO = #{param1} AND S.SCRAP_SEPARATOR = 2
